definition: the duration of a conference/the period over which a conference (or expo etc) is held/session/the date of a meeting
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]

sentences.english: Who handles the day-to-day work in between ministerial conferences?
sentences.chinese: 誰處理部長級會議休會期間的日常事務？

sentences.english: But then the Senate turned it down and adjourned.
sentences.chinese: 然而，這個法案被參議院否決了，隨後進入休會期。

sentences.english: Any operation and new session will be using this driver.
sentences.chinese: 任何手術，並在新會期將使用這個驅動程序。

sentences.english: The two-year session of this legislature between elections of the House of Representatives.
sentences.chinese: 衆議院代表選舉期間的兩年會期。

sentences.english: Second, are the parties open to the duration of the talks?
sentences.chinese: 第二個問題，各方是否對此次會期持開放性的態度？

sentences.english: In the intervals between meetings of the Ministerial Conference, its functions shall be conducted by the General Council.
sentences.chinese: 在部長級會議休會期間，其職能應由總理事會行使。

sentences.english: I don't want to upset the apple-cart now by asking you to change the date for meeting.
sentences.chinese: 我不希望現在才讓你變更會期而搞得整個計劃落空。

sentences.english: The Shanghai World Expo is fixed for 184 days.
sentences.chinese: 上海世博會會期定爲184天。

sentences.english: Peres spoke at the opening of the winter session of the Knesset, Israel's parliament.
sentences.chinese: 佩雷斯在以色列議會開始冬季會期時發表講話。

definition: the curtain falls/lower the curtain/to come to an end (of a meeting)
to beat the gong to open a performance
(Chinese) National People's Congress/abbr. to 人大[Ren2 da4]
pinyin: Quan2 guo2 Ren2 min2 Dai4 biao3 Da4 hui4

definition: (to be done) by (a certain date)/lasting (a certain time)
